title: Angler waders

properties.name: description
properties.value: The angler waders are obtained from aerial fishing by purchasing it from Alry the Angler for a price of 100 Molch pearls or acquired randomly from completing a game of Fishing Trawler. The waders grant 0.6% bonus Fishing experience. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler waders are 1 of 4 pieces of the Angler's outfit.

Item ID13260

The angler waders are obtained from aerial fishing by purchasing it from Alry the Angler for a price of 100 Molch pearls or acquired randomly from completing a game of Fishing Trawler. The waders grant 0.6% bonus Fishing experience. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler waders are 1 of 4 pieces of the Angler's outfit.

When a player receives it from the Fishing Trawler minigame, a message in the chat box states The luck of the sea is in today. You spot a piece of fishing gear caught up in the netting!

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Angler outfit set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 January 2019
(update)

The item's value was increased from 50 to 100.

12 April 2018
(update)

The weight of the angler waders was reduced from 12 to 1 kg.

[[File:Angler waders detail.png|75px|left]]
The '''angler waders''' are obtained from [[aerial fishing]] by purchasing it from [[Alry the Angler]] for a price of 100 [[Molch pearl|Molch pearls]] '''or''' acquired randomly from completing a game of [[Fishing Trawler]]. The waders grant 0.6% bonus [[Fishing]] [[experience]]. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler waders are 1 of 4 pieces of the [[Angler's outfit]].

When a player receives it from the Fishing Trawler minigame, a message in the chat box states ''{{Colour|#FF0000|The luck of the sea is in today. You spot a piece of fishing gear caught up in the netting!}}''
